benchmark_details.name: SAEBench: A Comprehensive Benchmark for Sparse Autoencoders in Language Model Interpretability
benchmark_details.overview: SAEBench provides a comprehensive evaluation framework that moves beyond the traditional sparsity-fidelity frontier to capture multiple dimensions of SAE performance, measuring performance across eight diverse metrics, spanning interpretability, feature disentanglement and practical applications like unlearning.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To provide a standardized benchmark suite and reveal previously hidden trade-offs in Sparse Autoencoders for interpretability research.

data.source: Open-source suite of over 200 SAEs across seven SAE architectures and training algorithms.

methodology.calculation: Metrics are calculated based on model evaluation across different defined tasks, presenting scores for each defined metric.
methodology.interpretation: Higher scores on defined metrics indicate better performance in terms of interpretability and feature disentanglement.
methodology.validation: Evaluated against a comprehensive said of SAE architectures and models
